website_summaries.verdict: A standout among bladeless fans for quality and engineering, this fan does not disappoint.
pros: Remote control gives you the power to make changes from across the room
The "quiet storm" of airflow coming from this modern-looking machine will keep you cool on the hottest days
cons: Not as powerful as a traditional bladed fan, though this is the case for most of the bladeless models we've reviewed

customer_reviews.title: FAN DOESN'T WORK FOR CRAP
customer_reviews.text: I paid $140 for this fan and nownits not working. Plus it's not giving me the option for returning it to get my money back. This fan is a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Parsley

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Totally quiet on lower speeds, I can't hear a thing on speeds 1-3, and even at the higher speeds it's still very quiet, and plenty of airflow.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Magee

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved!
customer_reviews.text: Button is sensitive...my dog can cut it on with his nose with no problem when he is hot. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Watkins

customer_reviews.title: 5 MINUTES DEAD
customer_reviews.text: ONLY WORKED 5 MINUTES MADE LOUD NOISE AND STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as much air movement as I’d hopef
customer_reviews.text: Makes some noise of course-not as quiet as I’d thought it would be. Remote works but you need to be close to fan for it to work does not put out as much air as I’d hoped. It is not as tall as I’d hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan. Air circulation is not as strong as other fans but this one is fine for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: K. CARLSON

customer_reviews.title: Wish i could return it
customer_reviews.text: Loud and doesn't push much air anymore and its loud when on. Wish I could return this.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Blown away!
customer_reviews.text: Great for individual use. It will not cool a full room. But, looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing compact bladeless fan! That's it!
customer_reviews.text: I would like it to have more power but don't get me wrong it's plenty powerful I'm just always hot. The range of rotation is amazing! For the compact size I'm blown away, pun intended, at the amount of air it pushes out. The best benefit by far is that it draws cooler air in through the bottom so any cold air from an AC or central air will be rotated downward as it is pulling in air. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: James Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: space saver!
customer_reviews.text: works great and takes a small space. I use it in my kitchen when I am cooking.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and not powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Anything above the low setting is extremely loud and it is not very powerful. I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: J. Yeksigian

customer_reviews.title: Great product & fantastic service
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fan is very quiet. The customer service is exceptional. They respond to questions and concerns extremely fast, and really work hard to do the right thing. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: KHA

customer_reviews.title: Very Safe
customer_reviews.text: Very safe around kids and it works very well but a little noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Valane

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 4 days, and works great so far. Good amount of wind and super sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D. Boone

customer_reviews.title: Cute fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan is super cute, but if you are looking for a big gust of air to come from this fan don't do it. It blows out a nice amount but not enough to cool a room. It's good for personal use like at your desk or watching TV. The noise level wasn't bad at all the remote is Handy and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: I Am Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, really impressed! I've only had it for a short time. But because of the way it's enclosed I can't see it get dust, animal fur in it or anything to stop it. If it holds up electrically, it ways well worth the price. Moves air around great! There is hardly any sound from it! Fits about any where you what to put it! Very sleek!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: G r e a t fan. It’s not a strong blowing fan but it definitely cools the house. I have high ceilings and in the summer it’s hard to keel the room cool this definitely helps
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Aragona

customer_reviews.title: Small nice stylish fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is really stylish and looks very cool. Like some kind of futuristic robot. It's very quiet compared to convention fans. So this is perfect anywhere you don't want a loud humming sound. My only complaint would be, I'd like to be able to control the oscillation distance. When I sleep I don't want such a wide rotation. The blown air is a very thin line which might be good or bad depending on preference. It's not a wide blast area. like many other fans.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Very good fan , quiet with forceful air flow
customer_reviews.text: Bought several floor fans for my home and office this one topped all of them ! Very quiet , great amount of air flowc great options on controls. I want to return the others and buy more of this one ! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan works really good, strong air flow for the design. Also a great space saver, the remote works great from 20+ feet. The fan has a nice looking design and has a nice blue led at the bottom of the base, not to bright just a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost 80

customer_reviews.title: Quiter than most fans
customer_reviews.text: I've had lasko and other fans before but this one is the quietest among all. It does have some sound but that actually helps me sleep better. Very sleek and good looking too!
customer_reviews.author: VishJ

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: While this is a very attractive fan, I just can't justify the price. Even on the highest setting it doesn't come close to any other tower fan I've owned. It gets 2 stars for aesthetics, none for performance. It is quite, but that's not surprising being that the air force is so low. I would not recommend this fan to anyone looking to actually be cooled. This is a mellow breeze at best. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Unit arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough fan. Might have been nice. But a tower fan that doesn't oscillate isn't worth the extra money. And in a world of OTHER FANS - I don't trust a company that sends out busted gear.
customer_reviews.author: LFTravels

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan!
customer_reviews.text: During the CA heat wave and fires, I have been desperate to find a good tower fan. This brand was recommended on CNET.com. And I trust their reviews. So I took a chance. It came completely assembled and ready to plug in. I love the sleek nearly invisible design. It can fit anywhere. It has 6 levels of fan power, you can choose rotation or not, you can set a timer, and best of all, there is a feature to lower the fan noise when sleeping. I really like that a lot since I use this in my bedroom. Highly recommend both for form and function.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Reader

customer_reviews.title: Cool fan
customer_reviews.text: Like it, cool looking and go functioning. The only bad thing I have to say is that my tv remote changes the fan settings. So if its going to be under or by your tv beware of that.
customer_reviews.author: ScottLaRock

customer_reviews.title: Far too weak airflow.
customer_reviews.text: I can barely feel the air from across my bed with the unit on full blast. Pretty much only useful for directly in front of your face.
customer_reviews.author: KyleWho?

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Fan quit working after power outage. I looked online to find a solution, but nothing worked. Maybe instead of getting cute with the design just to make more money, you should build a fan that actually works right!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Dies in 1 month and useless w out the remote
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a reduced price and let me tell you it’s horrible . It died and w out the remote control you won’t be able to use the warm hair smh . Worst product but nice concept
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Pereyra

product_meta.title: ULTTY Bladeless Fan | Quiet Oscillating Tower Fan | Remote Control & Timer, 9-Speed & 3 Modes, 40 Inches White
feature_bullets: 3D Air Circulation - moving air from bottom then out put air from long strip outlet makes whole room air 3D circulate. Build-in multi-layer dust isolation keeps room air fresh all the time.

Comfortable Cooling : different from old-school fans this fan provide dispersed airflow instead jet-focused airflow which makes a spring breeze throughout your home. You'll enjoy the different cooling breeze.

Safety & Space Saver : bladeless fan design without fast-spinning blades making it safe for children, pets and during cleaning. Skyline model stands 40" tall with a small 11" x 11" footprint, take little space and won't block room light and your sight.
3 Mode + 9 Speed Tower Fan : sleep mode provides right amount white noise to help your sleep, strong mode cool you down fast, with 9-speed setting you can adjust a perfect air flow.

Easy to use : quiet oscillating, remote control, sleep timer, LED Touch Screen, user-friendly for every family member. Great fan to improve air circulation and energy savings in your home, bedroom or office.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars163 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
